mapper.insert:
select ifnull(max(offerno), 0) + 1 as offerno from offertb
insert into offertb (offerno, puserid, cuserid, title, content, ddate, adate) values (#{offerno}, #{puserid}, #{cuserid}, #{title}, #{content}, #{ddate}, now() )
mapper.select: select count(*) from ( select a.puserid, a.cuserid, b.cusnm, a.title, a.content, a.gubun, a.adate, a.ddate from offertb a left outer join coinfotb b on (a.cuserid = b.cuserid) ) as a where puserid = #{puserid}
mapper.update: update offertb set gubun = #{gubun} where offerno = #{offerno} and puserid = #{puserid} and cuserid = #{cuserid}
